name: GoombaGotchi
description:
You play as a Goomba in a action game where you must collect either one power up or another. Each powerup will provide either a boost to one side of evolution for the goomba, or another side of evolution. You must collect as many of the first chosen powerup as possible. The other powerup becomes a negative powerup, a poison mushroom. Your score will be tallied at the end.

Press Up and Down to scroll the Game Info

Press Enter to Start the game
